data.energy_onsite: SELECT *, wind1 + wind2 + wind3 + wind4 + windA + windB AS wind, wind1 + wind2 + wind3 + wind4 + windA + windB + solar + hq_power AS net_power FROM energy_onsite ORDER BY time;
data.powerPrediction: SELECT time, SolarPower * 1000 AS SolarPower, WindPower * 1000 AS WindPower, HQTemperature, -HQPowerDemand * 1000 AS HQPowerDemand, (WindPower + SolarPower - HQPowerDemand) * 1000 AS NetPower FROM powerPrediction ORDER BY time;
data.metrics: WITH A AS ( SELECT time, SolarPower * 1000 AS SolarPower, WindPower * 1000 AS WindPower, HQTemperature, - HQPowerDemand * 1000 AS HQPowerDemand, ( WindPower + SolarPower - HQPowerDemand ) * 1000 AS NetPower FROM powerPrediction ORDER BY time ), B AS ( SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME( ROUND( UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time) / 900, 0 )* 900 ) AS time30, wind1 + wind2 + wind3 + wind4 + windA + windB AS wind, wind1 + wind2 + wind3 + wind4 + windA + windB + solar + hq_power AS net_power FROM energy_onsite ORDER BY time ) SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( DATE(B.time30) ) ) AS dateOnly, ROUND( SQRT( AVG( POWER(A.NetPower - B.net_power, 2) ) ), 2 ) AS rmse, IF ( SIGN(A.NetPower) >= 0, IF ( SIGN(B.net_power) >= 0, IF( B.net_power > A.NetPower, B.net_power - A.NetPower, 0 ), 0 ), IF ( SIGN(B.net_power) >= 0, B.net_power - A.NetPower, IF ( B.net_power > A.NetPower, B.net_power > A.NetPower, 0 ) ) ) AS energy_wasted, IF ( SIGN(A.NetPower) >= 0, IF ( SIGN(B.net_power) >= 0, IF( B.net_power > A.NetPower, 0, A.NetPower - B.net_power ), A.NetPower - B.net_power ), IF ( SIGN(B.net_power) >= 0, 0, IF ( B.net_power > A.NetPower, 0, A.NetPower - B.net_power ) ) ) AS energy_shortage FROM A JOIN B WHERE A.time = B.time30 GROUP BY dateOnly HAVING rmse IS NOT NULL;
